articles.author: Jake Boxall-Legge
articles.title: What we learned in Friday practice for the 2024 F1 Imola Grand Prix - Autosport
articles.description: Formula 1’s return to Europe meant the customary heavy raft of upgrades on show up and down the pitlane during Friday practice. But these, plus some tricky track characteristics, point towards Red Bull being on the backfoot and a fight between Ferrari and McL…
articles.content: After the opening series of pan-continental flyaway rounds, the Formula 1 circus returned to its European heartland and descended upon Imola. One of F1's returning classics after a lengthy spell away… [+12295 chars]
